sen.j: また、翌年には梅宮（後の文智女王）が生まれて再び延期となったため、不行跡として母与津子と妹梅宮は宮中より追放させられ、伯父四辻季継・高倉嗣良を含む公卿にも流罪や出仕差し止めの処分が下された。
sen.e: In 1619, judai was postponed again due to birth of Ume-no-miya (later Bunchi-Joo); therefore, his mother, Yotsuko, and younger sister, Ume-no-miya were expelled from the Imperial Court by reason of misconduct, and court nobles including his uncles, Suetsugu YOTSUTSUJI and Tsuguyoshi TAKAKURA were also subject to punishment of banishment or suspension of attendance.
